resources.string: To validate your ROM\'s commits, please connect to the internet!

If you were with us when masquerade was our backend system, you'd know that we needed root to do many things with OMS. That was the time when the system was extremely slow!

We also had a mode where substratum could run without masquerade and it would not offload any resource changes from our own app, meaning substratum will start lagging when enabling/disabling, since configuration changes are extremely heavy!

If you can, it would be highly recommended that you run a rootless variant such as Andromeda or a custom ROM with our new commits, to experience speedy theming.

By continuing using the rooted variant, there will be lags and performance issues with the app due to substratum not being able to offload any configuration changes to the system!
The background theme services are binded, active and running.
Substratum and Andromeda are NOT connected
The background theme services are binded, active and running.
Andromeda\'s service is not running, please rerun the desktop suite!
the theme showcase requires an internet connection to function!
Themer rejected theme installed on Samsung
This theme supports Team Black Out\'s Theme Ready Google Apps, if you do not have them, you can click Download to be redirected to their XDA thread, or Cancel if you already have them!
This theme supports Google\'s stock apps, the way they were made! If you have Theme Ready Google Apps installed then you do not need to remove them, but they are not required for this theme!

Legacy is provided as-is as we cannot guarantee full compatibility with colors. Please ensure you have a custom recovery for your device and have an understanding on how to restore from a bootloop before proceeding any further.\n\nWe cannot fix things that are not getting themed on legacy because they require system side changes.

Samsung support is provided as-is as we cannot guarantee full compatibility with colors and AOSP-built overlays. We have taken the care of hiding the dangerous overlays for your device, but you can toggle this off manually in settings at your own discretion.\n\nIf at any case you reach an issue with a possible black screen, please consult our XDA thread on the two methods of recovery.

Running on the Resource Runtime Overlay system, it is required to perform a reboot after adding or removing overlays.\n\nProceeding with this dialog would automatically reboot your device, so please be sure to have saved your work before continuing.
There were no apps found that could handle this request, sorry!
To use this build of substratum with your custom ROM, please enable \'Force authorize every theme app\' in Developer options.\n\nIf it is not there, please contact your ROM dev for missing commits!
Please select a shutdown animation from the dropdown list…
This will clear out any custom shutdown animations applied on your device
Please select a boot animation from the dropdown list…
This will clear out any custom boot animations applied on your device
Loading the image into the cache…
Both home and lock screen wallpapers configured!
Unable to set both home and lock screen wallpapers
To utilize theme wallpapers, an internet connection is required…
Seems like the loaded wallpaper database is empty…
Please select a font pack from the dropdown list…
This will clear out any custom fonts applied on your device
Font pack has failed to apply…
Please select a sound pack from the dropdown list…
This will clear out any custom sounds applied on your device

Alarms/Notifications/Ringtones are now selectable from Settings manually!

However, Substratum cannot grant itself "android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS", so it is not able to set them as your current sounds automatically.

By clicking grant, a new window will launch to request the 'Allow modify system settings' permission, so that you would not have this issue in the future.
To reset all sounds set by Substratum, you must enable \'Allow modify system settings\'.
To reset all fonts set by Substratum, you must enable \'Allow modify system settings\'.
To let Substratum control your system fonts, you must enable \'Allow modify system settings\'.
It seems like this pack was not set up correctly…
Enable Android Nougat notification styled theme cards.
Are you sure you want to uninstall this theme?
Overlays are now uninstalling in the background…
Please select a valid overlay to change states.

Substratum may not function as expected without these few crucial permissions granted.

Storage: Substratum needs to utilize your internal storage to store your system rescue archives, located in /storage/emulated/0/substratum/.

Firebase: Substratum utilizes Google's Firebase to download crucial information from our centralized real-time database to improve core services and security enhancements.
Successfully set %s as an app shortcut!
Removed %s from being an app shortcut.
This will perform a SystemUI restart on your device.
This will perform a full reboot on your device.
This will perform a soft reboot on your device.
This theme\'s package name must match in the manifest and code directories for proper key exchange.
Target application/overlay outdated or mismatched configuration selected…
Successfully copied error log to clipboard!
Hey %s,\n\nI have an issue with %s, and would like to see if you could help me resolve this issue.
There are no email clients installed.

With the dynamic priority system, you can adjust the overlay priorities as layers in terms of levels. What this means is the highest priority overlay will be loaded last and replace the resources on all of the overlays with lower priority and so on.
enable two or more overlays on one app to use me!
compile one overlay to be able to use me!
This function makes a copy of your currently enabled overlays list and places it in \"/storage/emulated/0/substratum/profiles/\" for safekeeping.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
When a profile is loaded, your current setup is completely wiped and \"restore theme\" would take on the updated changes.
These overlays will be installed to restore your profile completely:
There are no overlays in your current set up.
Please select a profile from the dropdown list before trying to restore a profile!
Please select a profile from the dropdown list before trying to delete a profile!
please type a name for your profile…
Please enter a name for your profile before backing up!
Cannot use whitespace inside profile name!
Please grant substratum storage permissions or the app will not function properly!
Do you want to clean all overlays for this theme?
Do you want to disable all overlays for this theme?
Do you want to enable all installed overlays for this theme?
could not fall back to rooted mode
there are no other theme engines able to be utilized on this device at this current time…
%s was just updated, relaunching for new changes!
One or more overlays cannot compile due to missing configurations under this set up…
Selected overlay(s) updated with some errors!
Please compile this overlay before applying!
Please select a valid overlay before performing this action.
\"%s\" was not found in the list of themes installed…
\"%s\" was not found in the list of overlays installed…
There is a delay with the Andromeda Backend, please relaunch Substratum.
Substratum automatically hid unsupported system overlays for your device!
the andromeda desktop client needs to connect to your device to be able to function with substratum!
It seems that you are on a supported themable Oreo device, an addon was released to support this!
It seems that you are on a supported Samsung device, an addon was released to support this!
It seems that you are on a supported Samsung device, but Firebase could not be verified. Please try running through a VPN and reinstall the substratum app as your country may have blocked it!
It seems that you are on a supported Samsung device, with the Samsung addon installed. However, verification has failed. Please try reinstalling the addon from Play Store!
All overlays for this app have been updated.
All overlays for this theme have been updated.
No errors while installing selected overlays
An error has occurred during overlay installation
Substratum restarted automatically after a settings change.
Automatically recreate the SystemUI after enabling/disabling a SystemUI overlay
SystemUI will recreate dynamically instead of restarting!
SystemUI will restart automatically instead of recreating!
Show each theme\'s target SDK levels, theme version and plugin version as a tag on each of the theme cards.
When the theme has been compiled, vibrate the device to notify the user that the compilation has completed.
The app\'s icon has been removed from your launcher!
The app\'s icon has now been added to your launcher!
This will allow you to toggle between having the launcher icon visible or invisible on your home screen.
All overlays for this theme are now deactivating…
All installed overlays for this theme are now activating…
All LogChar reports will be stored in /storage/emulated/0/substratum/LogCharReports/.
Other target overlays will be disabled when installing / enabling a new overlay
Other target overlays will remain unchanged when installing / enabling a new overlay
Not only did we create something that works for the users, but we worked in conjunction with themers to make it a wonderful theming engine for the community!
A huge thank you to these translators for bringing Substratum to everyone around the world!
What\'s great is when the community comes together and unifies to create an app that works for all of us!
These people brought you Layers Manager in the past and have since went on to do many great things in getting Substratum ready for us!
a minimal yet powerful theme engine based on Sony\'s overlay manager service
do you love your themes? introducing a gorgeous card view interface to showcase each of your theme\'s preview images installed on your device!
not sure whether you want your Google+ themed? that\'s okay, just pick whatever you want themed from the overlay list!
by clicking on the floating action button after selecting overlays, you could compile (do this first!), enable and disable each overlay directly on your phone to begin using your theme.
you can switch over to your own apps and allow the overlays to compile in the background as this process may take a while. just check your notification panel for the progress!
we hope you enjoy our creation!
thank you for reading the introduction and we hope you enjoy using substratum as much as we did while developing for it!
This function gives you the possibility to automatically switch between profiles based on the time of day.
Please configure Start and End times!
Please select all the profiles you want enabled!
Profile will be changed after screen is off.
Now processing your saved overlay states…
This will stop the app from using the legacy compiler fallback mechanism to help themes when they reach an unrecoverable state.
This will delete all of the currently saved logs. By pressing continue, all logs will be cleared and logs will no longer be saved.
This may completely break the compilation process. Only enable this option if you know what you are doing!

This is a crucial safety feature to recover you from bad overlay force closes! You can use the Rescue Me! button on Substratum\'s app shortcut if you find yourself stuck, or your final resort would be to flash the rescue archives found in /storage/emulated/0/substratum/.
select the items you want to backup
Please select at least one option!
Automatically build and install an updated version of all overlays for the recently updated, themed application.
Automatically build and install an updated version of all overlays for the recently updated theme.
Please do NOT have PackageInstaller open in the foreground while the notification is up, framework overlays tend to restart PackageInstaller causing indefinite amounts of recompiling!
Show a notification when a recently installed app has an overlay available in a theme.
This will force the application to use the English language.
Show all the overlays normally dangerous for Samsung devices if the theme does not support it.
We hid dangerous overlays for a reason, but if you are sure you want this enabled, please follow the instructions to disable it on our XDA thread!
Automatically disable an overlay when detecting repetitive crashes on the overlaid app.

As of version 816 and beyond, our signature for signing overlays has changed to prevent possible signature mismatches down the road.

This means that your overlays installed must be cleaned out to install new theme updates or it will say that your overlay requires a forever update!

This message will not show when all overlays are compiled using the newest Substratum.
Your device is encrypted, so root is necessary to apply boot animations.
Your device is encrypted, so root is necessary to backup and restore boot animations.
FloatUI is dynamically filtering your apps!
There are no overlays configurable for %s!
Please grant Substratum "draw over other apps" for the floating UI and "Usage stats" permissions to access the foreground app for matching theme targets.
Please grant Substratum "usage access" permissions to access the foreground app for matching theme targets.
Please manually grant Substratum "usage access" permissions and "draw over other apps" in App Settings to use FloatUI!
You can open the theme by clicking on this notification!
Your system reloaded substratum\'s resources. The app will restart in 3 seconds.
I\'m so sorry for this crash!
Unfortunately, there seems to be a problem with an overlay installed targeting Substratum and will have to be manually uninstalled using Settings.
Restoring overlays, font packs, sounds or wallpapers may take some time so please be patient.
This function removes the previously applied boot animation and restores it to the stock boot animation\n
This function removes all the previously applied overlays and restores the system back to the stock theme by way of either uninstalling or disabling them.\n
This function removes the previously applied sounds set and restores it to the stock sounds set\n
This function allows for the removal of the previously applied wallpaper on the homescreen, lockscreen or both and restores the system wallpaper to the homescreen, lockscreen or both\n
This function removes the previously applied fonts set and restores it to the stock fonts set\n
This version of Substratum is not authorized and will not work with the system Interfacer module.
All enabled overlays for this app have been disabled.
this rom is not community supported!
Main notifications (New and updated theme, theme compile completed, etc)

Clearing the local cache will remove all the files used by the theme compiler and online downloader. All theme packs and user configurations will remain as-is.\n\nDepending on the size of your cache, this may take a few seconds to complete.

Are you having trouble with the application? Or did you recently make a big version leap from an old version of substratum? A simple configuration clear would definitely aid troubleshooting the issue!
The app will close after reset is complete!
If you are uninstalling all overlays, please use the Substratum Rescue ZIPs to avoid possible bootloops.
Substratum will automatically reload the SystemUI after an overlay targeting SystemUI is enabled/disabled.
Substratum will not automatically reload the SystemUI after an overlay targeting SystemUI is enabled/disabled.

On Android Oreo, notifications will be automatically cleared to simulate a restart of the cached notification channels.\n\nPlease ensure your notifications do not contain any important data when compiling or enabling SystemUI or framework overlays. This does not affect ongoing notifications.
This reverts back to the legacy app UI found in old versions of substratum, enabling priorities, profiles, filtered theming modes and much more if the system allows.
Successfully copied version code to clipboard!
